title: Company Info
content:
Company Identity
Core Proposition: Voxel Digital builds intelligent software solutions that solve real-world problems through custom development and ready-made SaaS products.
Mission: Transforming complex business challenges into elegant, automated solutions using cutting-edge technology.
Positioning: The technical partner for businesses needing custom software, and the innovator behind specialized tools for construction, behavioral health, and education.

Key Messaging Pillars
AI-Powered Automation: "Turning weeks of manual work into minutes"

Full-Stack Expertise: "From concept to cloud deployment"

Real-World Impact: "Software that solves actual problems"

Industry Specialization: "Deep tech for construction, behavioral health, and education"

Entrepreneurial Insight: "Built by founders, for founders"

Product Highlights
Voxel Quote:

AI automates construction vendor communication

Reduces quotation process from weeks to minutes

Extracts and organizes pricing automatically

Real-time tracking dashboard

Voxel Behavior:

ABA/FBA platform for behavioral analysis

AI-generated action plans for children

Family management and progress tracking

Based on established behavioral science principles

Educational Platform (Coming Soon):

Gamified learning with token rewards

Progress tracking and analytics

Engaging content for children

Target Audience Segments
Construction Professionals: Estimators, project managers, contractors

Behavioral Health: ABA therapists, behavioral analysts, special education professionals

EdTech: Parents, teachers, educational content creators

Business Leaders: Founders needing custom software, operations managers

Tech Community: Developers interested in AI implementation, full-stack architecture

Tone & Voice Guidelines
Professional but approachable (not overly corporate)

Clear value-focused (emphasize time saved, efficiency gained)

Technical credibility (show depth without unnecessary jargon)

Solution-oriented (focus on problems solved)

Authentic/Founder-led (speak from personal experience)

Content Themes & Angles
Educational Content:

How AI is transforming [construction/behavioral health/education]

Technical deep dives: "How we built X feature"

Industry pain points and technological solutions

Product-Focused:

Feature spotlights and use cases

Customer success stories (even hypothetical/anonymized)

Behind-the-scenes development updates

Thought Leadership:

Founder insights on software development

AI implementation challenges and solutions

Building SaaS products from solo founder perspective

Community Engagement:

Ask for feature suggestions

Share relevant industry news with commentary

Quick tech tips (Next.js, PostgreSQL, deployment best practices)

Hashtag Bank
Primary: #VoxelDigital #SoftwareDevelopment #AI #SaaS
Product-Specific: #VoxelQuote #ConstructionTech #VoxelBehavior #ABA #EdTech
Technical: #FullStack #NextJS #NodeJS #PostgreSQL #WebDevelopment
Industry: #PropTech #HealthTech #EducationTechnology #DigitalTransformation

Sample Post Frameworks
Problem/Solution Format:
"Struggling with [industry pain point]? We built [product/feature] to solve exactly that. Here's how it works..."

Technical Insight:
"Building [feature] presented an interesting challenge with [technology]. Here's our approach and why we chose [specific solution]..."

Product Update:
"Just shipped [feature] for [product]! This helps users [specific benefit]. Try it now at [link]"

Industry Commentary:
"Noticed [industry trend] in [construction/behavioral health/education]. Here's how technology is addressing this shift..."

Behind-the-Scenes:
"As a solo founder, balancing [technical challenge] with [business need] is constant. This week I focused on [specific task]..."

Unique Value Propositions to Emphasize
Built by a technical founder who understands both code and business

Real products solving real problems (not just theoretical)

Full-stack control from database to deployment

Practical AI implementation (not just hype)

Industry-specific expertise across diverse domains
